content:
Job Title: Transformation Manager
Organization: Comunidad Judía de Madrid

The Transformation Manager will be responsible for leading large-scale change initiatives within the organization, working with a variety of stakeholders and aligning different departments and teams. This individual will be responsible for implementing new strategies, processes, systems and standards, with the goal of orchestrating positive impact across all transformation initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:

* Lead and manage complex organizational change initiatives that drive significant improvement and create lasting impact
* Develop and present cases for change initiatives to senior leadership for approval
* Monitor progress of each initiative throughout its life cycle, ensuring that deadlines are met and objectives are achieved
* Develop and implement detailed project plans, coordinating with teams and other stakeholders
* Provide training and support to teams and stakeholders as needed
* Allocate resources and prioritize initiatives to meet project goals and deadlines
* Collaborate with external partners as necessary
* Analyze data to identify areas for improvement and increase the efficiency and effectiveness of processes
* Establish and maintain clear and effective communication plans to ensure all stakeholders are informed and engaged throughout the transformation process.

Qualifications:

* Proven experience leading complex organizational change initiatives
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
* Ability to think strategically and analytically
* Strong project management skills and experience
* Experience working with cross-functional teams and collaborating with external partners
* Strong training and facilitation skills
* Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; advanced degree preferred.

Comunidad Judía de Madrid is an equal opportunity employer, and we welcome and encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply.
